content:
Sure! Here are some of the eco-friendly accommodations that are available in or around Khao Yai National Park:

1. Lala Mukha Tented Camp: This eco-friendly campsite is located in the heart of the park and offers visitors a unique, sustainable accommodation experience. The tents are comfortable and equipped with all the necessary modern amenities, while the campsite itself is designed to have a minimal impact on the surrounding environment.

2. Lakehouse Khao Yai: This luxurious eco-resort is located just a few kilometers from the park and offers visitors a relaxing and sustainable vacation experience. The resort is designed to blend in with the natural surroundings and is built using locally sourced materials. It features a beautiful lake, lush gardens, and a range of eco-friendly activities.

3. Bonanza Resort Khao Yai: This family-friendly resort is located just outside the park and offers visitors a range of eco-friendly accommodations, including spacious villas and comfortable cottages. The resort also features eco-activities such as hiking, bird-watching, and guided wildlife tours.

4. Greenery Resort Khao Yai: This resort is located in the Pak Chong area, just a short drive from the park. It features a range of eco-friendly amenities, including an organic garden, solar-powered hot water, and a recycling program. The resort also offers eco-activities such as hiking, mountain biking, and horseback riding.

These are just a few of the eco-friendly accommodations available in and around Khao Yai National Park. Be sure to do your own research and find the one that best suits your needs and budget.
